name: RTA – Restricted To Adult
author: Adult Web Host

sections.description:
The easiest way to label your wordpress website as “Restricted To Adult”. The RTA label is free to use, voluntary, and universally available to any website that wishes to clearly and effectively label itself as being inappropriate for viewing by minors – this plugin adds the RTA header to all of the pages on your website.

Simply activate the plugin and your done – it doesn’t get any easier than that.
sections.faq:
Q. Where can I learn more about RTA?
A. Go to http://www.rtalabel.org for more information.
sections.changelog:
V1.01 Added RTA Meta Tag Function

v1.0 initial release
